name: pnp-delete-m365-groups
title: CLI - Delete all Microsoft 365 groups
shortDescription: this script deletes the AAD groups you no longer need.
longDescription: There are so many different ways to create Microsoft 365 groups. Teams, Planner, SharePoint team sites, etc. â€” you can accumulate a lot of them very fast. Use this script below to delete the ones you no longer need.
